```scss
// Property: verticalAlign
// Component(s): Ti.UI.Button, Ti.UI.Label, Ti.UI.Switch, Ti.UI.TextArea, Ti.UI.TextField
'.vertical-align-bottom': { verticalAlign: Ti.UI.TEXT_VERTICAL_ALIGNMENT_BOTTOM }
'.vertical-align-center': { verticalAlign: Ti.UI.TEXT_VERTICAL_ALIGNMENT_CENTER }
'.vertical-align-top': { verticalAlign: Ti.UI.TEXT_VERTICAL_ALIGNMENT_TOP }
```
